ISSUE.TITLE: [now-next] now dev does not work with the new src directory
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Running `now dev` while having everything the `src` directory does not work. `next build` still works. Next.js `v9.1.0`. No `now.json`. ![Screenshot from 2019-10-07 20-37-27](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40987398/66358765-5a15c400-e942-11e9-8ca1-e3a68b753f11.png) Thanks!

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [now-build-utils] Allow a null `fallback` in `Prerender` (#3144) This allows a `null` `fallback` to be provided to a `Prerender`. The use case is a lazily prerendered route (often meaning dynamically rendered).
